verses.verse: It happened,<WH7586> when Saul was returned<WH7725> from following<WH310> the Philistines,<WH6430> that it was told<WH5046> him,<WH559> saying, "Behold,<WH1732> David is in the wilderness<WH4057> of En Gedi.<WH5872>"

David<WH1732> also arose<WH6965> afterward,<WH3318> and went out of the cave,<WH4631> and cried<WH7121> after<WH310> Saul,<WH7586> saying,<WH559> "My lord<WH113> the king!<WH4428>" When Saul<WH7586> looked<WH5027> behind<WH310> him,<WH1732> David bowed<WH6915> with his face<WH639> to the earth,<WH776> and showed respect.<WH7812>
David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Saul,<WH7586> "Why do you listen<WH8085> to men<WH120>'s words,<WH1697> saying,<WH559> <WH1732> 'Behold, David seeks<WH1245> your hurt?<WH7451>'

Behold,<WH3117> this day your eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200> how that Yahweh<WH3068> had delivered<WH5414> you today<WH3117> into my hand<WH3027> in the cave.<WH4631> Some urged<WH559> me to kill<WH2026> you;<WH2347> but I spared you;<WH559> and I said, I will not put forth<WH7971> my hand<WH3027> against my lord;<WH113> for he is Yahweh<WH113>'s anointed.<WH4899>

Moreover,<WH1> my father, behold,<WH7200> yes,<WH7200> see the skirt<WH3671> of your robe<WH4598> in my hand;<WH3027> for in that I cut off<WH3772> the skirt<WH3671> of your robe,<WH4598> and didn't<WH2026> kill you,<WH3045> know and see<WH7200> that there is neither evil<WH7451> nor disobedience<WH6588> in my hand,<WH3027> and I have not sinned<WH2398> against you,<WH6658> though you hunt for my life<WH5315> to take it.<WH3947>
May Yahweh<WH3068> judge<WH8199> between me and you,<WH3068> and may Yahweh avenge<WH5358> me of you;<WH3027> but my hand shall not be on you.

Against<WH310> whom has the king<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> come out?<WH3318> Whom<WH310> do you pursue?<WH7291> A<WH310> dead<WH4191> dog?<WH3611> <WH310> A<WH259> flea?<WH6550>

Now,<WH3045> behold, I know that you shall surely<WH4427> be king,<WH4427> and that the kingdom<WH4467> of Israel<WH3478> shall be established<WH6965> in your hand.<WH3027>

Swear<WH7650> now therefore to me by Yahweh,<WH3068> that you will not<WH518> cut off<WH3772> my seed<WH2233> after<WH310> me,<WH8045> and that you will not destroy my name<WH8034> out of my father<WH1>'s house.<WH1004>"
David<WH1732> swore<WH7650> to Saul.<WH7586> Saul<WH7586> went<WH3212> home;<WH1004> but David<WH1732> and his men<WH582> went up<WH5927> to the stronghold.<WH4686>
